cmput301_17.includebucket

Class NewRiderRequestActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • cmput301_17.includebucket.NewRiderRequestActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osmdroid.events.MapEventsReceiver

    public class NewRiderRequestActivity
extends Activity
implements org.osmdroid.events.MapEventsReceiver
    NewRiderRequestActivity In this class, the user should be able to specify the start and end locations by typing in an address or by clicking on the map (clicking on the map should automatically fill in the start and end locations). These locations are values for instantiating a new Request.
